ServicesSection.title: Find the Best Services
ServicesSection.description: Services – H Power H Power offers a wide range of support services designed to meet your everyday needs. Whether you're seeking assistance with household tasks or other support roles, we're here to provide the ideal solution. Our services are tailored to be flexible, reliable, and of the highest quality—ensuring your comfort and satisfaction every step of the way

FirstSection.title: About Us – H Power Services | Your Trusted Service Partner in the UAE
FirstSection.description: At H Power Services, we are committed to delivering reliable, high-quality home and professional services across the UAE. As a licensed entity under H POWER FZ-LLC, we operate with the highest standards of professionalism, transparency, and integrity. Our platform serves as a trusted bridge between skilled service providers and clients seeking excellence—whether at home or in business. We believe in fostering a culture of collaboration, quality, and innovation to meet the evolving needs of our vibrant society. Driven by a passion for service and a commitment to progress, H Power is here to simplify your daily needs with trusted hands and outstanding results.

items.subtitle: Ease of communication:
items.content: We aim to enable individuals in the United Arab Emirates to easily access high-skilled services for the services they need.

items.subtitle: Building a collaborative community:
items.content: We aim to build a community based on cooperation and positive interaction between service providers and users, where they exchange notes and comments.

items.subtitle: Commitment to innovation and development:
items.content: We always strive to improve and develop our services, and respond quickly to user aspirations and changing market needs.

sections.title: Our Vision
sections.content: We seek to stimulate skills and facilitate access to services through (H power) platform. We are committed to providing a safe and reliable environment for users to enhance communication and collaboration. Where those searching for services meet distinguished people in every field with ease.

items.subtitle: Quality:
items.content: We are committed to providing high-quality services. We strive to meet and exceed our customers' expectations by providing the best skills and experience.

items.subtitle: Transparency:
items.content: We believe in the importance of transparency in our relationships. We work to provide clear and accurate information about services and prices to ensure a transparent and reliable user experience.

items.subtitle: Diversity and inclusion:
items.content: We value diversity and consider it a source of strength. We collaborate with diverse service providers and welcome different individuals to form a community that reflects diversity of ambitions and skills.

individual_clients.description: Customers can request a refund if they cancel 4 hours before the service is scheduled to be provided. Unfortunately, refunds or service exchanges are not possible after this period or in cases of urgent requests such as same day delivery. To receive a refund, cancellations must be made within the specified time frame, with the exception of services and exclusive offers that are not covered by the refund policy.

partner_companies.title: For Partner Companies
partner_companies.description: Partner companies can cancel their subscription and request a refund within 24 hours of subscribing. If more than 24 hours have passed since the subscription, the company will not be eligible for a refund. Refund Process: You will be notified via email whether your refund request has been approved or denied. If approved, the amount will be refunded to the original payment method within 7-10 business days. For further inquiries, please contact us via email or customer service.

section.title: Privacy policy
section.description_1: When you use our Services or Website, you may be asked for personally identifiable information such as your name, address, email address, and telephone number. By giving us such information, you will need to consent by using it in the manner described in this policy.
section.description_2: You may withdraw your consent at any time by emailing us at <email>info@hpower.ae</email>. We will return or destroy your personal information within five days of receipt of your withdrawal of consent.

Terms.title: Terms and Conditions
Terms.paragraph_1: Welcome to our website. If you continue to browse and use this website, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which together with our privacy policy govern HPOWER’s relationship with you in relation to this website. If you disagree with any part of these terms and conditions, please do not use our website.
Terms.paragraph_2: The term “HPOWER” or 'us' or 'we' refers to the owner of the website whose registered shop in Ras Al Khaimah, UAE. The term 'you' refers to the user or viewer of our website.
Terms.point_1: The content of the pages of this website is for your general information and use only. It is subject to change without notice.
Terms.point_2: This website uses cookies to monitor browsing preferences. If you do allow cookies to be used, the following personal information may be stored by us for use by third parties.
Terms.point_3: Neither we nor any third parties provide any warranty or guarantee as to the accuracy, timeliness, performance, completeness or suitability of the information and materials found or offered on this website for any particular purpose. You acknowledge that such information and materials may contain inaccuracies or errors and we expressly exclude liability for any such inaccuracies or errors to the fullest extent permitted by law.
Terms.point_4: Your use of any information or materials on this website is entirely at your own risk, for which we shall not be liable. It shall be your own responsibility to ensure that any products, services or information available through this website meet your specific requirements.
Terms.point_5: This website contains material which is owned by or licensed to us. This material includes, but is not limited to, the design, layout, look, appearance and graphics. Reproduction is prohibited other than in accordance with the copyright notice, which forms part of these terms and conditions.
Terms.point_6: All trademarks reproduced in this website which are not the property of, or licensed to, the operator are acknowledged on the website.

Footer.All_Copyright: H POWER FZ LLC 2025 - All rights reserved

ProvidersTerms.paragraph1: Please read the following terms carefully. By completing the form and clicking "Agree & Sign", you confirm your acceptance of these Terms & Conditions.
ProvidersTerms.paragraph2: H POWER promotes and facilitates services provided by your ("Service Provider"). You agree to deliver services to customers with professionalism and in a timely manner.
ProvidersTerms.paragraph3: You must be legally registered business and provide valid trade/commercial license and related documents up to date.
ProvidersTerms.paragraph4_1: H POWER retains a commision percentage (defined below).
ProvidersTerms.paragraph4_2: You will be paid monthly after deducting commission and any refund-related charges.
ProvidersTerms.paragraph4_3: Payments are subject to UAE tax regulations
